NoArgs.cwd: Show the REAL current working directory
NoArgs.help: Show the list of available commands
NoArgs.version: Show the system version of QOS

NeedArgs.cat: Show the content of a file
NeedArgs.echo: Display a message on the console
NeedArgs.ls: Show the list of files and directories in a directory
NeedArgs.activate: Activate Quarter OS by using Activate Code
NeedArgs.ping: Check the network connection to a host

PackageManager.pkg: A simple name to use Biscuit
PackageManager.bkt: A simple name to use Biscuit
PackageManager.bpm: A simple name to use Biscuit
PackageManager.pm: A simple name to use Biscuit

ShizukuCompat.shizuku: PY OS Improved Package Manager on Quarter OS
ShizukuCompat.szk: A simple name to use Shizuku
